data.title: Movies Shot in Central Park
data.meta_description: 100's of films have been shot in Central Park over the last century beginning with Romeo and Juliet in 1908 - here's our list.
data.text:
Hundreds of movies have been shot over the years using Central Park as a location – beginning with Romeo and Juliet filmed in 1908 on Bethesda Terrace. Here is our list including all films up to 2011. You can find our Top Ten here.

2011

The Avengers

Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
